refnamediv.refpurpose: Plays a note on a channel in a fluidSynth engine.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plays a note at imidikey pitch and imidivel velocity on ichannelnum channel of number ienginenum fluidEngine.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ienginenum -- engine number assigned from fluidEngine
ichannelnum -- which channel number to play a note on in the given fluidEngine

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the fluidNote opcode. It uses the file fluidNote.csd and 19Trumpet.sf2.
Example of the fluidNote opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
The output should include a line like this:
SoundFont: 1 Bank: 0 Preset: 56 Trumpet metallic
